{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.05462v1", "title": "Marsden--Meyer--Weinstein reduction for $k$-contact field theories", "summary": "This work devises a Marsden--Meyer--Weinstein $k$-contact reduction. Our
techniques are illustrated with several examples of mathematical and physical
relevance. As a byproduct, we review the previous contact reduction literature
so as to clarify and to solve some inaccuracies.", "main_category": "math.DG", "categories": "math.DG,math-ph,math.MP,math.SG", "published": "2025-05-08T17:54:10Z"}
